alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 10:29AM CDT until April 11 at 6:24AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Neches River Near Town Bluff ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine. * WHEN...From late tonight to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Moderate flood damage along the bayou begins at this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 20.6 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Bayou Anacoco Rosepine 17.0 11.6 Fri 9 am CDT 20.1 20.4 17.9 &&
